engine
Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
  engine.Simulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public final class Simulation
extends Object
implements Runnable

Simulation to, when given a World, and two Brain objects, allow the Ants in the World to move, according to their Brains, and to record the result after a number of steps have passed.

Version:
1.0
Author:
pkew20 / 57116

Constructor Summary

          Simulation to enable the construction of Simulation objects

Constructor Detail

Simulation

public Simulation(GameEngine gameEngine,
                  Brain blackBrain,
                  Brain redBrain,
                  Semaphore semaphore,
                  int fitness,
                  boolean useFitness,
                  int rounds,
                  World world,
                  String goal)
           throws IllegalArgumentEvent
Simulation to enable the construction of Simulation objects

Parameters:
gameEngine - the GameEngine to get the sleep duration from
blackBrain - the Brain the black Ants in the World will use
redBrain - the Brain the red Ants in the World will use
semaphore - the Semaphore to use to notify other objects of the completion of this Simulation by releasing a permit
fitness - the index of the fitness array in the Brains to increment with the result of the simulation
useFitness - if true, add the net food of the Brain's Ants to the fitness of the Brain, otherwise increment wins, losses or draws of the Brain
rounds - the number of steps that each Ant in the World will execute
world - the World to use to play the Brains against each other
Throws:
IllegalArgumentEvent - if the goal is not valid

getWorld to get this Simulation's World

Returns:
